items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t have to eat this if he doesn\'t want to.
Tom wondered whether Mary regretted what she\'d done.
Tom gave Mary good advice, but she didn\'t follow it.
If you don\'t help Tom, he\'ll have trouble doing it.
Tom felt exhausted after chopping wood all afternoon.
Tom finally got the courage to ask Mary to marry him.
Tom folded the blankets and put them into the closet.
I didn\'t expect Tom to ask me that kind of question.
Why don\'t you tell me the way you think it happened?
You and I both know that that isn\'t going to happen.
